findings.title: Inconsistency in decimal places between `t.initialPosToken` and `v.reward1`
findings.description: There is an inconsistency in the decimal places between `t.initialPosToken` and `v.reward1`, which will lead to an incorrect calculation of the trade's `initialPosToken`.

findings.title: GAM-14: Use safeMint instead of mint for ERC721 and ERC1155
findings.description: The `DEPOSITOR_ROLE` will be minted NFT when `deposit()` is called. However, if `user` is a contract address that does not support ERC721, the NFT can be frozen in the contract.

findings.title: GAM-23: Use two-step verify pattern
findings.description: The finding suggests using a two-step verification pattern to ensure secure ownership transfer and governance updates.
